about_the_game:
- Classic Tower Defense Experience
- Dice-based towers
- Customise your towers by making certain rolls better
- Pick from 3 different characters with powerful passive powers



In this Tower Defense your towers are what you make them to be. Choose from a large collection of effects to put on your towers, and level up the different die types with the upgrade paths to make them stronger.

Effects can be obtained by paying resources and comes with a roll requirement, in order to trigger the effects. Effects and roll requirement come in many different shapes and sizes and it is up to you to construct powerful towers.


The King has many guilds and they will all serve him eventually. However you can use your incredible powers of gamblemancy to change which order you face them. Be careful though, as guilds will become gradually stronger until you face them.


Are you feeling a little lucky, or maybe just short of some crystals? Then you can test your luck and skills with a variety of minigames, in which you can barter and wage your hard earned resources to gain (or lose :) ) the upper hand.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Dual-core 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything with shader model 5.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Gamblemancer TD is a tower defense game where you decide how your towers work. Customize 6 different towers based on typical role-playing dice D4 to D20.
